Key Match Events: Shadab Khan followed up a 22-ball 52 with two crucial wickets
Kagiso Rabada run out (Mohammad Nawaz/Haris Rauf)
Anrich Nortje caught by Mohammad Haris, bowled by Haris Rauf
Pre-Game Insights: A win for Pakistan keeps them in contention for a semi-final, victory for South Africa ensures their final-four spot
Post-Match Reflections: Bavuma: Pakistan defeat not a concern but 'a bit of a wake-up call'
Shadab Khan's all-round heroics keep Pakistan's semi-final hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's captain refuses to blame slippery conditions for their fielding errors
Shadab and Pakistan put on an exhibition of intent - but did it come too late?
